title: Renewing Your Mind During Parenting Challenges
itunes:summary:
John and Danny offer help for parents who are exhausted by strong-willed children.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast. Or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Amber Lia and Wendy Speake's book "Triggers: Exchanging Parents' Angry Reactions for Gentle Biblical Responses" with your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-05-11?try=1&refcd=1100002

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/renewing-your-mind-during-parenting-challenges/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey
